body: @minux are you just compiling, or linking too? The crash is from the linker. I went overboard and wrote a long test for this in CL 9396. On my machine, that CL reproduces the problem. The trybots are all failing with a different error, alas--e.g. https://storage.googleapis.com/go-build-log/5fd61e6c/linux-amd64_2b23d376.log.
